LUNCH AND LEARN Harnessing healthcare data: a bold future for virtual care
Thursday, March 17 | 1-2 p.m. Eastern Orange County Convention Center Room 203A, West Building Image Female Doctor using Tablet
With the increasing pace of virtual care adoption and the heightened need for continuity of care, Microsoft and Teladoc Health are proud to partner together with the common goal of delivering a better healthcare experience—virtually.
Join Teladoc Health and Microsoft as we discuss how to implement a sustainable virtual care strategy, while focusing on protecting patient health information. We’ll talk about how your organization can use technology to give care teams access to timely patient data, enabling them to individualize treatment plans and provide the right care at the right time.
Learn more <[[https://www.himss.org/global-conference/session-harnessing-healthcare-data-bold-future-virtual-care]]>
Learning objectives: Explore real world challenges to implementing a remote monitoring ecosystem from scratch, including best practices and lessons learned Examine the technical infrastructure required to empower remote patient monitoring, enable real-time interventions and protocols needed to protect patient information Understand how data, technology platforms and AI can make personalized care a reality Speakers Rajya Bhaiya, MedTech Director, Health & Life Science Cloud + Data Microsoft Bruce Brandes SVP, Health System Innovation Teladoc Health Kim Swafford MHA Healthcare Industry Executive, Americas Microsoft About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
